title: Person With Relationships
description: How to query for a person with associated relationships.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<fs:familysearch xmlns="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <person id="PW8J-GZ0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" rel="person" title="Conclusions"/>
        <gender type="http://gedcomx.org/Male"/>
        <name>
            <nameForm>
                <fullText>Daniel Earl Bishop</fullText>
            </nameForm>
        </name>
        <display>
            <gender>Male</gender>
            <lifespan>1885-1981</lifespan>
            <name>Daniel Earl Bishop</name>
        </display>
    </person>
    <relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/Couple" id="C123-ABC">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" rel="man" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" rel="person1" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PA65-HG3" rel="person2" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/C123-ABC" rel="relationship" title="Couple Relationship"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PA65-HG3" rel="woman" title="Conclusions"/>
        <person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" resourceId="PW8J-GZ0"/>
        <person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PA65-HG3" resourceId="PA65-HG3"/>
    </relationship>
    <fs:childAndParentsRelationship id="PPPX-PP0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0" rel="child-and-parents-relationship" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" rel="child" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ1" rel="father" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ2" rel="mother" title="Conclusions"/>
        <fs:father resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ1" resourceId="PW8J-GZ1"/>
        <fs:mother resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ2" resourceId="PW8J-GZ2"/>
        <fs:child resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" resourceId="PW8J-GZ0"/>
        <fs:fatherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/AdoptiveParent" id="C.1"/>
        <fs:motherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/BiologicalParent" id="C.2"/>
    </fs:childAndParentsRelationship>
    <fs:childAndParentsRelationship id="PPPX-PP0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0" rel="child-and-parents-relationship" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PS78-GH4" rel="child" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" rel="father" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/null" rel="mother" title="Conclusions"/>
        <fs:father resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PW8J-GZ0" resourceId="PW8J-GZ0"/>
        <fs:child resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PS78-GH4" resourceId="PS78-GH4"/>
        <fs:fatherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/AdoptiveParent" id="C.1"/>
        <fs:motherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/BiologicalParent" id="C.2"/>
    </fs:childAndParentsRelationship>
</fs:familysearch>
